sentences: Ma ei kuula sind, kui sa peatusid rääkimast.
Tema suurim probleem oli see, et ta lihtsalt ei osanud kuulata.
context: 'Kuulake' is primarily used as a command to 'listen'. It can also mean 'to hear' in the sense of perceiving sound. The base form is 'kuula', and it's commonly used in everyday communication when someone wants another person to pay attention.
